sentence.Network_en: The cunning varmint would suspect something, and be dodging through the trees like a frightened deer.
sentence.Network_cn: 这只狡猾的狐狸一定会起疑心, 会象一只受惊的鹿那样,逃进林子里去.

sentence.Network_en: A duck. If varmint cannot be restrained tongscorn - on - the - cob holders, stand on it.
sentence.Network_cn: 一只老鸭. 即使坏蛋不能被绳之以法, 坚持下去.

sentence.Network_en: Turn me loose, you varmint and get out of here!
sentence.Network_cn: 放开我, 你这个无赖,快点出去!
